item.title: about me
item.description: Hi My name is Aleksandr Sobolev, I’m a software developer from Saint Petersburg, Russia. How to contact me Telegram is the fastest way to do it. I don’t check email very often, but you can still try. If you really want to follow me Instagram — mostly shitposting and boring real life stuff. Twitter — mostly retweets and instagram feed mirroring (yes, more shitposting). facebook, vk
